levels.description:
Passive: Summons may be deployed on ranged tiles and deal <@ba.vup>Arts damage</>
Active: Ling and her summons deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to <@ba.vup>2</> enemies within Attack Range and <$ba.root>Bind</> them for <@ba.vup>{ling_s2_unmovable.duration}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>After the skill ends, retrieve all summons with less than 50% HP. Can store {value} charge(s)</>
